wai.hover: Set up n8n + voice capture; baseline flow working
wai.title: Weeks 1–2 — WAI
wai.subtitle: Environment + input pipeline
body: Provisioned n8n and configured basic workflows.
Implemented meeting/voice capture → text pipeline for BA inputs.
Mapped I/O contracts for downstream enrichment.

ba.hover: CWS landscape → Intake BPD first pass
ba.title: Weeks 1–2 — BA
ba.subtitle: CWS overview + Intake process diagram
body: Studied end-to-end CWS lifecycle (intake → assessment → case → permanency).
Produced first-pass Intake Business Process Diagram (BPD).
Identified stakeholders and hand-offs.

wai.hover: n8n ↔ Jira issues for BA artifacts
wai.title: Weeks 3–4 — WAI
wai.subtitle: Jira integration & artifact creation
body: Connected n8n to Jira for story/issue creation.
Mapped BA artifact fields into Jira issue templates.
Error handling & retries for API calls.

ba.hover: Refined Intake BPD; started Functional Requirements
ba.title: Weeks 3–4 — BA
ba.subtitle: BPD refinement + FR reading
body: Iterated Intake BPD to cover edge cases and alternative flows.
Read and annotated exemplar Functional Requirements (FRs).
Aligned BPD steps to FR coverage.

wai.title: Weeks 5–6 — WAI
wai.subtitle: Generate ACs + ADF (artifact delivery format)
body: Prompted robust Acceptance Criteria generation from BA inputs.
Normalized outputs to a consistent artifact delivery format (ADF).
Added guardrails for incomplete inputs.

ba.hover: Drafted FRs; wrote ACs aligned to standards
ba.title: Weeks 5–6 — BA
ba.subtitle: Authoring FRs and ACs
body: Authored FRs for intake flows with clear scope & rationale.
Wrote ACs emphasizing flexible entry order and single-screen nav.
Cross-checked standards compliance (ACF/CCWIS).

wai.title: Weeks 7–8 — WAI
wai.subtitle: End-to-end pipeline + logging
body: Wired input → enrichment → artifact → Jira end-to-end.
Added logging/metrics to monitor throughput & errors.
Refined UX hooks (preview before commit).

ba.hover: Demo reps in the system; stakeholder comms
ba.title: Weeks 7–8 — BA
ba.subtitle: In-system demo reps + communication
body: Performed intake demos in the system; handled Q&A.
Practiced stakeholder-style communication and narrative.
Peer feedback loops to tighten delivery.

wai.hover: Polish UX; finalize docs; demo script
wai.title: Weeks 9–10 — WAI
wai.subtitle: Polish + documentation + final demo
body: Polished prompts, error states, and artifact formatting.
Produced technical + usage docs.
Final demo run-through & timing.

ba.title: Weeks 9–10 — BA
ba.subtitle: Capstone pack + presentation prep
body: Consolidated FR + AC pack as capstone.
Aligned slides to demo story; refined talk track.
Dry-runs with timeboxes and final edits.
